translations: adj.精力最充沛的；最健壮的

sentences.sentence: Never in its bloodiest prime can the sight of the gigantic Colosseum, full and running over with the lustiest life, have moved one heart, as it must move all who look upon it now, a ruin.
sentences.translation: 在那血腥的年代，这座宏大角斗场那巨大的、充满强劲生命力的形象没有感动过任何人，现在成了废墟，却能感动每一个看到它的人。
